title: How to write “haha” in Chinese? And how would it be written in pinyin - Quora

response.answer_text: What a relief! I thought you were going to ask the names of all honored warriors in the Spring-Autumn War period, or the major principles in the Analects of Confucius. Haha, in Chinese, and then, PinYin.  哈哈 Hāhā. That is, Ha1 ha1. Enjoy! Try to give a simple smile while with Chinese people. That tends to mitigate many misunderstandings.
Ha ha translate to Chinese is 哈哈(ha ha)
